### Independent Review of Environment and Climate Change Canada’s High Performance Computing Solution Renewal
#### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: 5000079688-B
* **Publication Date**: June 7, 2024
* **Closing Date**: June 27, 2024 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 2, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 30, 2024
* **Evaluation Criteria**: Technical Merit within a Stipulated Maximum Budget

#### Background
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC)’s Meteorological Service of Canada (MSC) requires an independent review of its preparations for the 2028 High Performance Computing (HPC) solution renewal. This review aims to ensure that ECCC’s renewal plan meets the required standards and is aligned with industry best practices.

#### Solicitation Overview
This solicitation is a re-tender of the requirement described in bid solicitation number 5000079688 dated May 15, 2024, with a bid closing date of May 29, 2024. The renewed solicitation is seeking:

* One (1) P.13 Independent Information Technology (IT) Project Review Team Leader (Level 3)
* Two (2) P.14 Independent Information Technology (IT) Project Reviewers (Level 2)

#### Eligibility
This solicitation is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region (NCR) for Stream 5 Project Management in the following categories. All interested suppliers must have a valid TBIPS Supply Arrangement for Tier 1 in the NCR Region for the respective category.

#### Security Requirements
There are security requirements associated with this procurement.

#### Contact Information
If you have any questions about this solicitation, please contact Marie-Christine Blais, Concierge, via email at marie-christine.blais@ec.gc.ca or by phone at 514 473 7087.

#### Important Notice
Submit all inquiries no later than June 19, 2024. Enquiries received after that time may not be answered.

#### Procurement Details
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade
